title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Strengthening Instructional Capabilities for Effective Medical English Purposes (EMP)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of General English Education and Understanding of Fundamental Medical Terminology
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Apply at least three core instructional strategies when designing medical scenario-based English lessons
Develop survey instruments and interview guides for analyzing learner needs in medical fields
Develop and utilize in-classroom at least five specialized language materials for medical contexts (diagnosis, surgery, patient counseling, etc.)
Categorize medical terminology and specialized expressions by context and select appropriate instructional methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
